description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.cM54UpNXExgDSbq4]{Exocortex}

Your exocortex allows you to apply any one of the following drone mods to yourself as if you were a drone with that mod installed: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.h4EjHKa3CRq6CYuR]{Armor Slot (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.t1A7Tw7dNDTB5Pcs]{Cargo Rack (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.W49lpCz2CD7VwRB2]{Climbing Claws (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.q1Q4CghodW0XqoDk]{Enhanced Senses (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.4gjHCwW9idbr7gam]{Hydrojets (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.XhDmuUyUtVjgLrTo]{Jump Jets (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.E5UGSczcIiQjjPKI]{Resistance (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.vQZIgWmcaXkYi5sd]{Smuggler's Compartment (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.3YVIlvpNrqOZsWq8]{Speed (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.28PhX1gOjYNvC3Fa]{Weapon Proficiency (Ex; Exocortex)} (gaining proficiency in advanced melee or heavy weapons).

At 11th level, you can apply an additional mod, and your options expand to include @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.pqo5zoVm0SgSgpH9]{Echolocators (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.clyTaWVj65CVkLH2]{Excavator (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.NkWVPJFn6IGlc4Jh]{Flight System (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.NvU3xMfhhEBxAvbd]{Greater Resistance (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.4k95KNutF1eAghPx]{Invisibility Field (Ex; Exocortex)}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.0bdUwHd54TkeC62Z]{Reactive Camouflage (Ex; Exocortex)}. At 14th and 17th levels, you can apply an additional mod. Each time you gain a level, you can switch any of your mods for different mods, but you must always choose at least one mod from the 7th-level list.
